pr_title: [Java] Fixes Spring generator devaultValues for int64/float/double

timeline.message:
Updates spring generator to omit type suffixes from int float double defaults, adds testDefaultValuesFixed

Adds the test testDefaultValuesFixed

timeline.bodyText: We need a case for Long (isLongSchema) and add "L" at the end of the default value. Please see the error message below for details.
timeline.author: wing328

replies.bodyText: For CodegenProperty, I changed the code back to preserve the "l" suffix for this case. If you need me to change our existing code in AbstractJavaCodegen.java from adding "l" to "L" please let me know.
replies.author: spacether

timeline.bodyText: We need a case for Float (isFloatSchema) and add "F" at the end of the default value. Please see the error message below for details.
timeline.author: wing328

replies.bodyText: For CodegenProperty, I changed the code back to preserve the "f" suffix for this case. If you need me to change our existing code in AbstractJavaCodegen.java from adding "f" to "F" please let me know.
replies.author: spacether

timeline.message: Updates SpringCodegen to only remove character suffixes from CodegenParameter defaultValues, updates tests
Fixes decorators on java method postProcessParameter
